project-basis: javascript, jquery, html, css, nodejs, 0x protocol, aqueduct, web3js
project-future-plans: More sophisticated gaming experience, support other ERC20 tokens to bet.
project-purpose: Allow players to buy in the game directly with ETH through metamask wallet and bet with other ERC20-tokens. Currently it is using a concept with 0xJack game credit, which is same rate as ZRX token. The buy-in backend mechanism is powered by 0x protocol to trade ETH with other ERC-20 tokens to bet.
project-inspiration: Cross over of decentralized exchange and the online gaming space where people could play and trade at the same time.
project-lessons-learned: I'm happy to be able to integrate various frameworks together and understand more in-depth how to utilize the blockchain dev tools like metamask, ethereum-testrpc, calling the 0x protocol and etc.
project-accomplishments: Be able to make my imagination into reality this weekend.
